evidence.claim: Spinach.io supports FHIR for interoperability in healthcare data.
Spinach.io implements HL7 standards for health data exchange.
The platform utilizes AWS cloud services for scalable data management.
Spinach.io integrates with EHRs using standard health tech protocols like HL7 and FHIR.
Integration middleware support is provided for real-time data processing and management.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse capabilities found.
